__prompts__.django_base_dir: Base directory of your Django project (relative to the frontend folder or absolute)
__prompts__.venv_base_dir: Base directory of your venv (relative to the frontend folder or absolute)
__prompts__.use_stimulus: Would you like to use the Hotwire Stimulus javascript library ?
__prompts__.use_turbo: Would you like to use the Hotwire Turbo javascript library ?
__prompts__.use_htmx: Would you like to use HTMX in your project ?
__prompts__.use_alpinejs: Would you like to use Alpine.js in your project ?
__prompts__.use_daisyui: Would you like to use DaisyUI for CSS components (need TailwindCSS) ?
__prompts__.use_tailwindcss: Would you like to use TailwindCSS ?
__prompts__.use_crispy_tailwind: Would you like to use Crispy Tailwind ?
__prompts__.use_bootstrap: Would you like to use Bootstrap 5 (Cannot be used with TailwindCSS) ?
